title: Ep. - 303 - DIRECTORS OF SEDUCED: INSIDE THE NXIVM CULT FORMER MEMBER OF NXIVM
description:
Filmmakers Cecilia Peck and Inbal B. Lessner talk about their four-part docuseries Seduced: Inside the NXIVM Cult, which follows the story of India Oxenberg's perilous journey through the dark and criminal world of the notorious self-help-group-turned-sex-slave-cult NXIVM.

 

Former Nxivm member Kelly Thiel talks about her experience as a member of the organization.

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey

Cameo: https://www.cameo.com/katecasey

Twitter: @katecasey

Instagram: @katecaseyca
